paragraphs.text: Momo came across a pile of lychee nuts.

paragraphs.body: The lychee nut is a type of reddish-brown ${link_0} that grows in the ${link_1} and ${link_2}, as well as around the ${link_3}. It can be used to make ${link_4}, juice, or put in a ${link_5} as bait for small animals.
paragraphs.text: The lychee nut is a type of reddish-brown fruit that grows in the Earth Kingdom and Fire Nation, as well as around the Western Air Temple. It can be used to make tea, juice, or put in a trap as bait for small animals.

paragraphs.body: The lychee nut is also a fruit in the real world, and is native to southeast Asia. It is a nut only in name, as it has a rind covered with blunt spikes that makes it more similar to a berry. It contains inedible seeds separated by white, delicate, grape-like pulp. It would appear that the Avatar World's lychee nut has the same qualities as the real world's, as it is used in juice and tea. This suggests its kinship to berries.
